about_the_game:
The full soundtrack for STSP: Super Titty Space Prison. Specially mixed for the soundtrack release this includes the full length version of each track in the game. Prepare your earbuds for seven tracks of dramatic and fast paced electronic music.

Seven unique tracks in high quality MP3 format.
